content: new yarn start with standing double_crochet in chain space after first decrease of the petal * 3 double_crochet in same chain space 2 double_crochet miniy picot miniy 2 double_crochet in next chain space 4 double_crochet in next chain space chain 1 double_crochet in first chain space after decrease on the next petal * repeat from * to * 5 more times on last repeat skip last double_crochet and slip_stitch in first double_crochet 80 sts 5 chain 60 double_crochet 10 miniy 5 picot round 5 if you are using same yarn chain 1 if you are starting with new yarn start with a standing st * bpsc around second double_crochet of the new petal bpsc around next st 6 times chain 2 bpsc around next st 7 times fptr around single_crochet from 3rd round * repeat from * to * 4 more times slip_stitch in first bpsc 85 sts 10 chain 70 bpsc 5 fptr 4 star in the middle mandala by sanita brensone round 6 if you are using same yarn slip_stitch 7 more chain 1 if you are starting with new yarn start with a standing st * long single_crochet place your hook through picot over the single_crochet of the picot and through the chain space from pervious round chain 3 dtr in fptr from previous round chain 6 dtr in same st 3 times chain 3 * repeat from * to * 4 more times slip_stitch in first long single_crochet 145 sts 120 chain 5 long single_crochet 20 dtr round 7 if you are using same yarn chain 1 if you are starting with new yarn start with a standing st in first chain space after long single_crochet * 6 single_crochet in next chain space fpsc around first dtr from previous round 10 single_crochet in next chain space fpsc around next st 3times 6 single_crochet in next chain space * repeat from * to * 4 more times slip_stitch in first single_crochet 230 sts 210sc 20 fpsc round 8 if you are using same yarn chain 1 single_crochet in 3rd loop of same st chain 3 counts as first dtr for dtr3tog dtr2tog in 3rd loop of next sts first dtr3tog made if you are starting with new yarn start with a standing dtr3tog place first dtr in 3rd loop of first single_crochet after the picot place second dtr in 3rd loop of next st place third dtr in 3rd loop of next st * chain 2 skip 7 sts tr2tog in 3rd loops of next sts chain 2 tr2tog in 3rd loops of next sts chain 2 skip 7 sts decrease in 3rd loops of next sts chain 2 decrease in 3rd loops of next sts 5 star in the middle mandala by sanita brensone chain 2 skip 7 sts tr2tog in 3rd loops of next sts chain 2 tr2tog in 3rd loops of next sts chain 2 skip 7 sts dtr3tog in 3rd loops of next sts chain 2 dtr3tog in 3rd loops of next sts
